text: Liev Isaac Schreiber (; born October 4, 1967) is an American actor, producer, director, and screenwriter. He was known for his role in Scream, Phantoms, The Sum of All Fears, X-Men Origins: Wolverine, Salt, Taking Woodstock, and in The Butler. Schreiber was born on October 4, 1967 in San Francisco, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Interview with Details * Interview with Men's Vogue * Interview with W magazine Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Liev Schreiber
